column4: Anyone know off the top of their head how we can disable the loud Beep when you backspace too far ( I already have it disabled in System>prefs>sounds) still beeps

There actually is a file somewhere that you can touch or echo 1 to or something that disables the system beep on a kernel level. I forgot what it was though, and hated myself a little, so I lashed out at you. =P
